```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
members <- claims %>% 
  filter(MRN_ALIAS != '23C9A67453F9') # 
  group_by(YEAR) %>% 
  group_by(MRN_ALIAS, MEMBER_SEX) %>% 
  summarize(CURRENT_AGE = max(MEMBER_AGE),
            NO_CLAIMS = n(),
            NO_VISITS = max(EPISODE_SEQ),
            ED_CLAIMS = sum(SERVICE_TYPE == 'ED'),
            PROP_ED = mean(SERVICE_TYPE == 'ED'),
            ED_NN = sum(SERVICE_TYPE == 'ED' & ED_NOT_NEEDED_PROP >= .8),
            PRO_ED_NN=mean(SERVICE_TYPE == 'ED' & ED_NOT_NEEDED_PROP >= .8))
```
